meanings.definition: An extra payment or reward given for good performance.
meanings.sent1: She received a bouns for her hard work at the office.
meanings.sent2: The employee was thrilled to get a bouns for exceeding sales targets.
meanings.sent3: The surprise bouns made her smile from ear to ear.
meanings.sent4: The bouns was like a cherry on top of her successful month.
meanings.sent5: The bouns motivated her to work even harder next time.

meanings.sent5: The ball seemed to bouns endlessly down the stairs.

meanings.definition: To hit or strike something with force.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally bouns his head on the low doorway.
